text: Kaya tumhi tya dambhika (munaphika) lokanna nahi pahile, je apalya grantha balaganaryammadhila kaphira bandhavanna mhanatata ki jara tumhala desabahera ghalavile gele tara amhihi avasya tumacyasobata desatyaga karu ani tumacyavisayi kadhihi konace mhanane man'ya karanara nahi ani jara tumacyasi yud'dha kele kele tara niscita amhi tumaci madata karu, parantu allaha saksa deto ki he agadi khotarade aheta
